document_data.caption: A bone club is activated.
document_data.name: Bone Club
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bone club''''' was an [[Arcane magic|arcane]] [[spell]] from the schools of [[necromancy]] and [[enchantment]] that allowed a [[wizard]] to transform a regular bone into a magical weapon.
document_data.Powers: The spell lasted for several minutes depending on the skill of the caster.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s a bone such as a femur and pinch of dirt from a grave to cast.
document_data.History: This spell was found within the ''[[Book of Shadows]]'', a [[tome]] based upon the oration of the [[necromancer]] [[Nebt Bhakau]] of [[Zakhara]].
